food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys like me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 A tasty treat for a monkey!
💛 I'm the color of sunshine.
🍌 You can peel me and eat me!

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on trees. Sometimes I'm green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I hang from branches.
🍎 A popular fruit!
🔴 I can be in pies!

food.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 A bunny's favorite snack!
🥕 I grow in the ground.
🔶 You can eat me raw or cooked.

food.question: I am white and good with cookies. Sometimes I'm chocolate flavored. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 You drink me!
🐄 I come from a cow.
🍪 I go great with a treat.

food.question: I'm small and green and grow in a pod. You can eat me as a side! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I come from a plant.
🟢 I'm the color of grass.
😋 I'm good with dinner.

food.question: I am long and brown, and you can fry me to make a tasty snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 I grow under the ground.
🍟 You can dip me in ketchup!
🌍 Famous around the world.

food.question: I am a fruit and also a color. I am juicy and citrusy. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 You can name a color after me!
🍊 I'm round, sweet, and tangy.
☀️ People like to eat me during summer

food.question: I am made from milk, but I'm hard and you can slice me. I am often yellow or white. What am I?

hints.text: 🐭 Mice like me!
🧀 You can put me on a sandwich.
🔪 You can cut me in slices.

food.question: I am a berry, and I am blue. Sometimes you eat me in muffins. What am I?

hints.text: 🧁 Delicious in baked goods!
🔵 I am a small, round fruit that is blue.
🥣 You can put me in your cereal!

food.question: I am a big vegetable, and people carve faces in me for Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 I'm popular in the autumn!
🧡 My color is typically orange.
👻 People cut scary faces on me

bug.question: I have spots and I fly. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have lots of little circles on me.
🌷 I like to land on pretty flowers.
🐞 I am small and red (usually).

bug.question: I make honey, and I buzz. Who am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I live in a hive with lots of friends.
💛 I am yellow and black.
🐝 I fly around collecting nectar to make honey.

bug.question: I dig in the ground and carry things. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.
🏠 I live in a colony underground.
🐜 I am tiny and often brown or black.

bug.question: I wiggle and crawl and live in the dirt. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I help plants grow by aerating the soil.
🪱 Birds like to eat me.
🌧️ I come out when it rains because I can't breathe in flooded soil.

bug.question: I jump very high and am green. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat plants and grass.
🎵 I make a chirping sound, especially in the summer.
🦗 I have long back legs for jumping.

bug.question: I fly around at night and like lights. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I glow in the dark with a bioluminescent light.
✨ I have a light on my tail to attract mates.
🌃 You see me blinking in the dark during summer evenings.

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my dinner. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is sticky and made of silk.
🕷️ I have eight legs and eight eyes, usually.
🪰 Flies and other insects get stuck in my home, then I eat them.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and transform into something new and pretty. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I go inside a chrysalis or cocoon for my metamorphosis.
🌈 I have colorful wings with intricate patterns.
🦋 I flutter around in the sunshine, sipping nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I have many legs and crawl quickly on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 💯 I can have anywhere from 30 to over 300 legs!
🪵 I sometimes hide under logs, rocks, or in damp places.
🐛 I have a long, segmented body with a pair of legs on each segment.

bug.question: I can be many colors and I like to eat wood. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I can damage wooden structures and furniture.
🐜 I live in a colony with a queen, workers, and soldiers.
🏠 I build nests from wood shavings, and can create tunnels within wood.
